'''Radiant Spincrystal 26''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Call It a Day in Liyue]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in one of the raised pavilions in [[Liyue Harbor]], right above the area with [[Tea Master Liu Su]].
